author: martinc
msg: Add a new 'charset' attribute to the <message> tag, to allow the explicit
addition of a character set to the content type.

author: martinc
msg: Add a new 'port' attribute to the <mail> tag, and a new <port> tag, to
allow the specification of a non-standard SMTP port.

author: catlett
msg: UserTag and PasswordTag added to documentation
